oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Color print of Robert E. Lee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Framed color portrait of Robert E. Lee. The image is a copy print of the 1904 painting by Ogdensburg, New York, artist Theodore Pine. Pine based his painting on multiple images of Lee. A stamp, featuring Lee, is included at the bottom of the frame. The 30 cent U. S. stamp was issued on September 21, 1955, as part of the Liberty Series.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lee, Robert E. (Robert Edward), 1807-1870
